channel.title: [HELP] need help login into my rsps [HELP]
channel.description:
hi moparscape i need help login into my rsps and everyone that plays it can login accept me! why is that? i port fowered so what can i do ??? help plz!!!!
thanks!

item.title: [HELP] need help login into my rsps [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

macca4g:

for sum1 telling him to run a server on 127.0.0.1 or 127.0.0.0 yea that never works mate rofl you have to put in your own server ip so it can connect 110% everytime

Sorry for grave digging, I was googling for this Forums and this came up… but anywho, macca4g you are seriously blinded by your own bullshit if you believe that you connect 110% more of the time through your ip instead of your localhost.
Again, soz for gravedig. Troll if you want x.

Read full topic

item.source: [HELP] need help login into my rsps [HELP]

item.title: [HELP] need help login into my rsps [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @macca4g macca4g
item.description:
@macca4g wrote:

[quote=“Marine5287, post:7, topic:382148”][quote author=macca4g link=topic=477950.msg3616391#msg3616391 date=1307015826]
This is the same problem i had but i figued it out.

You need to goto www.no-ip.com and register up and click add host

Then download the client from no-ip and run it.

After this is complete go into your client.java file do CTRL + F and look for serverip

Then it will say something like 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 change that to the no-ip you just made

then save it compile it and then people will be able to connect to your server =-)

Hope this helped bro
[/quote]

Hey man this thread was posted on February 11th. Please don’t grave dig.[/quote]

wel kid this was never answerd was it and i saw the post so i replied on it n stfu

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] need help login into my rsps [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @macca4g macca4g
item.description:
@macca4g wrote:

This is the same problem i had but i figued it out.

You need to goto www.no-ip.com and register up and click add host

Then download the client from no-ip and run it.

After this is complete go into your client.java file do CTRL + F and look for serverip

Then it will say something like 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 change that to the no-ip you just made

then save it compile it and then people will be able to connect to your server =-)

Hope this helped bro

item.title: [HELP] need help login into my rsps [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“RS2 Desert, post:3, topic:382148”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=477950.msg3497534#msg3497534 date=1297461503]
Are you sure your connecting on localhost?
[/quote]i think so
my ip is 10.1.1.1 and i port fowared how i can connect to localhost??[/quote]

Try connecting on 127.0.0.1, then your players connect on your no-ip/ip address.
